trans-unit.source: Describes a ClickOnce or native Win32 application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 描述 ClickOnce 或原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A token that represents a version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 表示 .NET Framework 版本的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式組態檔。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an assembly reference that represents the entry point of the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定代表應用程式進入點的組件參考。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference" /> object that represents the entry point of the application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference" /> 物件，代表應用程式的進入點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the error report.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤報告的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the URL of the error report.
trans-unit.target: 包含錯誤報告 URL 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file associations that are defined in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資訊清單中定義的檔案關聯。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file associations.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案關聯的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the application is hosted in a browser (as WPF Web Browser Applications are).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定應用程式是否裝載於瀏覽器中 (與 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式相同)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (<see langword="True" />), or not (<see langword="False" />).
trans-unit.target: 布林值，這個值表示即將部署的應用程式會裝載在瀏覽器 (<see langword="True" />)，或者不會裝載在瀏覽器 (<see langword="False" />)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> applies only to WPF Web Browser Applications.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 僅適用於 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, you should set <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser%2A> to `False` (the default value).
trans-unit.target: WPF 網頁瀏覽器應用程式以外的專案類型，您應該設定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser%2A>至`False`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser%2A> property to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 當您部署 WPF 瀏覽器應用程式時，您必須設定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser%2A>屬性`True`。

trans-unit.source: This causes the `<hostInBrowser>` tag to be added to the generated application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致`<hostInBrowser>`標記加入至產生的應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: This tag enables ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files.
trans-unit.target: 這個標記可讓 ClickOnce 部署瀏覽器裝載應用程式的專案，其中包含.xbap 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: You will also have to make the application available only online by setting <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須使用應用程式只能在線上藉由設定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A>至`False`。

trans-unit.source: If you do not do this, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).
trans-unit.target: 如果不這麼做，您會收到[MSBuild 錯誤 MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the program icon file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定程式圖示檔。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the icon file.
trans-unit.target: 代表圖示檔名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: The program icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used for the **Start** menu and **Add or Remove Programs**.
trans-unit.target: 程式圖示表示產生的應用程式資訊清單中，用於**啟動**功能表和**新增或移除程式**。

trans-unit.source: If this the icon file is not specified, a default icon is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果有此圖示檔未指定，會使用預設圖示。

trans-unit.source: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest or a native Win32 application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定資訊清單是否為 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單或原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest (<see langword="True" />) or a native Win32 manifest (<see langword="False" />).
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出資訊清單是 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單 (<see langword="True" />) 或是原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單 (<see langword="False" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 ClickOnce 應用程式部署中允許的檔案路徑長度上限。

trans-unit.source: If this value is specified, the length of each file path in the application is checked against this limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定這個值，則會根據這項限制來檢查應用程式中的每個檔案路徑長度。

trans-unit.source: Any items that exceed the limit cause a warning message.
trans-unit.target: 任何超過限制的項目都會產生警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: If this input is not specified or is zero, no checking is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果這項輸入未指定或為零，則不會執行任何檢查。

trans-unit.source: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示 ClickOnce 應用程式部署中允許的檔案路徑長度上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a textual description for the operating system dependency.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定作業系統相依性的文字描述。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the operating system dependency.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示作業系統相依性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a support URL for the operating system dependency.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指定作業系統相依性的支援 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the support URL for the operating system dependency.
trans-unit.target: 表示作業系統相依性之支援 URL 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum required operating system version required by the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定應用程式所需的最小必要作業系統版本。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the minimum required operating system version required by the application.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式所需的最小必要作業系統版本。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum operating system version required by the application.
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程式所需的最低作業系統版本。

trans-unit.source: An example value is "5.1.2600.0" for Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 範例值是"5.1.2600.0"Windows xp。

trans-unit.source: If this input is not specified, a default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此輸入，會使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the minimum supported operating system of the .NET Framework, which is "4.10.0.0" for Windows 98SE.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是支援的最低作業系統的.NET Framework 中，也就是 「 4.10.0.0 」 的 Windows 98SE。

trans-unit.source: However, if the application contains any native or Reg-Free COM references, the default is Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果應用程式包含任何原生模式或免 COM 參考，預設值是 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the <see langword="ProductName" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 <see langword="ProductName" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string value that corresponds to the <see langword="ProductName" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 對應到專案檔之 <see langword="ProductName" /> 屬性的字串值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至`ProductName`專案檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null。

trans-unit.source: If `ProductName` is null and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A> is `True`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ProductName`為 null 和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A>是`True`，RegisteredOrganization 值在登錄中的寫入至應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也是 null，則會使用組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the <see langword="PublisherName" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 <see langword="PublisherName" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string value that corresponds to the <see langword="PublisherName" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 對應到專案檔之 <see langword="PublisherName" /> 屬性的字串值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至`PublisherName`專案檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null。

trans-unit.source: If `PublisherName` is null and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A> is `True`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`PublisherName`為 null 和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A>是`True`，組件名稱會寫入應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資訊清單中定義的套件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the suite name.
trans-unit.target: 包含套件名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the <see langword="SupportUrl" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 <see langword="SupportUrl" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string value that corresponds to the <see langword="SupportUrl" /> property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 對應到專案檔之 <see langword="SupportUrl" /> 屬性的字串值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SupportUrl` property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至`SupportUrl`專案檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null。

trans-unit.source: If `SupportUrl` is null and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A> is `True`, an empty string is written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果`SupportUrl`為 null 和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A>是`True`，空的字串寫入應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a token that represents a version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示 .NET Framework 版本的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents a version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示 .NET Framework 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a trust object that defines the application security.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定可定義應用程式安全性的信任物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> object that defines the application security.
trans-unit.target: 定義應用程式安全性的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl" /> properties are written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl" /> 屬性是否會寫入應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl" /> properties are written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl" /> 屬性是否會寫入應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: If the value is <see langword="True" />, they are written to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是 <see langword="True" />，會將這些屬性寫入應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: If the value is <see langword="False" />, these properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是 <see langword="False" />，則會忽略這些屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl%2A> properties are set to null.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Product%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.Publisher%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.SupportUrl%2A>屬性會設定為 null。

trans-unit.source: They are used only if <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A> is `True`.
trans-unit.target: 才會使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A>是`True`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `True`, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`True`，這些屬性的值會寫入應用程式資訊清單中的對應標記。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A> is `False` (the default value), these properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.UseApplicationTrust%2A>是`False`（預設值），會忽略這些屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `UseApplicationTrust` property in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至`UseApplicationTrust`專案檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 執行各種檢查，以確認資訊清單是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection" /> 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.TargetFrameworkVersion%2A> property so that the validation can verify application manifest against the correct version of the .NET Framework runtime.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您必須設定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.TargetFrameworkVersion%2A>屬性，以便驗證可以確認針對正確版本的.NET Framework 執行階段應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ConfigFile" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ConfigFile" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ConfigFile" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ConfigFile" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the entry point identity to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將進入點識別序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The entry point identity.
trans-unit.target: 進入點識別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the entry point parameters to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將進入點參數序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The entry point parameters.
trans-unit.target: 進入點參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that specifies the entry point for executing the assembly and that is used to serialize the entry point to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，其中該屬性會指定用來執行組件的進入點，並用來序列化 XML 檔案的進入點。

trans-unit.source: The entry point for executing the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此進入點用來執行組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ErrorReportUrl" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ErrorReportUrl" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ErrorReportUrl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.ErrorReportUrl" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.FileAssociations" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.FileAssociations" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.FileAssociations" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.FileAssociations" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.IconFile" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.IconFile" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.IconFile" /> property.
